name: @fontoxml/docxml
description: A module for making .docx documents from scratch or from an existing .docx or .dotx template.

tasks.test: deno task lint && deno task check && deno test -A lib
tasks.test:coverage: deno task test --coverage=coverage && deno coverage --exclude='utils/xml-validation/fontoxml' --exclude='vendor' --lcov --output=coverage/cov.lcov coverage && genhtml --ignore-errors inconsistent --output-directory ./coverage/html_cov ./coverage/cov.lcov && open ./coverage/html_cov/index.html
tasks.precommit: deno task lint && deno task test
